text: Policy ID: POL-048 Title: Employee Conduct Policy Version: 1.0 Effective Date: 2025-01-01 Section 1: Purpose This policy outlines the rules and expectations regarding behavior, ethics, professionalism, and workplace integrity across all business units. Section 2: Scope This applies to employees, contractors, and authorized third parties interacting with company systems or information. Section 3: Key Requirements Passwords must be at least 12 characters long. All violations must be reported within 1 hours. Records must be retained for a minimum of 3 years. Gifts above 50 are prohibited. Standard working hours are 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM, unless otherwise approved. Section 4: Enforcement Non compliance may result in disciplinary action, access revocation, or legal escalation. Section 5: Contacts

d working hours are 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM, unless otherwise approved. Section 4: Enforcement Non compliance may result in disciplinary action, access revocation, or legal escalation. Section 5: Contacts Questions about this policy should be directed to compliance company.com.
